  • Method Details

    • generatePayroll

      void generatePayroll(int employeeId, double basicSalary, double overtimePay, double deductions)
      Generates the payroll using below parameters
      Parameters:
      employeeId - for which the Payroll is being generated
      basicSalary - the Base salary amount
      overtimePay - additional pay amount for overtime
      deductions - total of amount deductions levied by the employer on account of (Prof. Tax, Consumer Loans, EPF etc)

    • getPayrollById

      Payroll getPayrollById(int payrollId)
      Retrieves the payroll details for the given Payroll ID
      Parameters:
      payrollId - for which the payroll is being retrieved
      Returns:
      Payroll object containing the payroll details

    • getPayrollsForEmployee

      List<Payroll> getPayrollsForEmployee(int employeeId)
      Retrieves the list of payrolls for a given employee
      Parameters:
      employeeId - for which the payrolls are being retrieved
      Returns:
      Payroll type ArrayList conatining all the available payrolls for the given employee

    • getPayrollsForPeriod

      List<Payroll> getPayrollsForPeriod(LocalDate startDate, LocalDate endDate)
      Retrieves the list of payrolls for a given range of date
      Parameters:
      startDate - start of range (inclusive)
      endDate - end of range (inclusive)
      Returns:
      Payroll type ArrayList conatining all the available payrolls for the given range of date
